Author: dietfreddo
Text: I used to do that sort of thing(not as much as you) but then I fainted at work while serving customers... and then got in trouble for leaving work because I fainted haha. I now don’t fast, just restrict and make sure to have something somewhat sugary (not like, sweets or anything).   At least try to hydrate or supplement electrolytes. Especially if you’re getting all sweaty.
